## readEncodedFilter() function

Reads filter value from encoded string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function readEncodedFilter<TFilter>(defaultValue: TFilter, filterValue: string, reviver?: (this: any, key: string, value: any) => any): TFilter;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  defaultValue | TFilter | Default value of filter, which is overriden by values from filterValue |
|  filterValue | string | Encoded string containing filter value |
|  reviver | (this: any, key: string, value: any) =&gt; any | A function that transforms the results. This function is called for each member of the object. |

<b>Returns:</b>

TFilter
